description.en: Highlight (open) incidents that have problems (parents) that are closed
description.de: Hebe (offene) Incidents hervor, deren Probleme (Eltern) geschlossen sind

intro.text:
This module needs these add ons installed:

  • TicketOverviewHooked (>= 3.1.2)


To activate this feature, you have to add 'Kernel::System::TicketOverview::Hooks::MarkIncidentsWithClosedProblems' to the SysConfig option 'Ticket::Hooks'
